epic_description: Implement secure user authentication with JWT tokens and OAuth2 support
Build a secure payment gateway integration supporting multiple payment providers
Build a scalable notification system supporting email SMS and push notifications
Develop a high-performance product catalog with search and filtering capabilities
Build comprehensive order lifecycle management from creation to fulfillment
Create real-time analytics dashboard for customer behavior and sales metrics
Migrate from legacy API gateway to Kong with improved rate limiting and auth
Build backend services to support iOS and Android mobile applications
Implement real-time inventory tracking with warehouse management capabilities
Upgrade build and deployment pipelines with improved testing and security scanning
